promo.title: Circularity, Municipal Waste (PT)
promo.lead: Evolution of the recycling rate, targets 55% (2025) and 60% (2030), gaps and priorities — with automatically updating charts (between 2h and 24h, depending on source/cache), KaTeX formulas and CC BY 4.0 sources.

complaints.title: Categories with Most Complaints
complaints.subtitle: The most reported environmental topics on the platform. Available only in Portugal, for now.
